table.name: invoice_lineitem_vat
table.description: The CUMULATIVE and PROVINCE_CODE fields are included for future Canadian tax, and are *not* implemented as of VAT50

columns.name: INVOICE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the invoice.

columns.name: LINEITEM_SEQ_NO
columns.description: The Line Item Sequence number specifies the order of items on the invoice or bill.

columns.name: VAT_SEQNO
columns.description: The VAT Sequence number is used when more than one VAT is applicable to the line item. This field tells the system what order to charge the taxes in.

columns.name: VAT_CODE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the VAT tax that is being applied to the line item.

columns.name: VAT_COUNTRY_CODE3_GID
columns.description: Country for which this VAT item applies

columns.name: VAT_PROVINCE_CODE
columns.description: Province for which this VAT item applies (used for Canada).

columns.name: VAT_RATE
columns.description: The VAT charge rate.

columns.name: VAT_AMOUNT
columns.description: This is the actual VAT amount.

columns.name: VAT_AMOUNT_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The GID for the VAT amount currency.

columns.name: VAT_AMOUNT_BASE
columns.description: The VAT amount in the base currency.

columns.name: VAT_CALC_AMT
columns.description: This is the VAT amount calculated from the rate and base value.

columns.name: VAT_CALC_AMT_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The GID for the VAT calculated amount currency.

columns.name: VAT_CALC_AMT_BASE
columns.description: The VAT calculated amount in the base currency.

columns.name: VAT_OVERRIDE_AMT
columns.description: This is a manually entered amount to set the VAT regardless of rate.

columns.name: VAT_OVERRIDE_AMT_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The GID for the VAT override amount currency.

columns.name: VAT_OVERRIDE_AMT_BASE
columns.description: The VAT override amount in the base currency.

columns.name: IS_CUMULATIVE
columns.description: If 'Y', the amount of this tax is based on the base cost plus the previously-calculated taxes.

columns.name: EXCHANGE_RATE_DATE
columns.description: Indicates the date to be used for any currency conversions; if null, the latest conversion should be used.

columns.name: EXCHANGE_RATE_GID
columns.description: Indicates the set of exchange rates to use for currency conversions; if null, the default set should be used.

columns.name: VAT_AMOUNT_FN
columns.description: The functional currency amount for the VAT amount.

columns.name: VAT_AMOUNT_FN_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The GID for the  functional currency for the VAT amount.

columns.name: VAT_CALC_AMT_FN
columns.description: The functional currency amount for the vat_calc_amt.

columns.name: VAT_CALC_AMT_FN_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The GID for the functional currency for the VAT calculated amount.

columns.name: VAT_OVERRIDE_A_FN
columns.description: The functional currency amount for the VAT override amount.

columns.name: VAT_OVERRIDE_A_FN_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The GID for the functional currency for the VAT override currency amount.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
